projects.name: Global Cancer Initiative
projects.description: A leading organization dedicated to accelerating cancer research by providing genomic, transcriptomic data, and more to enhance cancer treatment research.

datasets.name: Cancer 360
datasets.description: Genomic and transcriptomic data from various cancer types to support biomarker research.

datasets.name: OncoGen
datasets.description: Comprehensive dataset providing mutation and expression data across multiple cancer types for biomarker discovery.

projects.name: Brain Research Initiative
projects.description: Collection of data supporting research into neuro biomarkers and therapeutic targets, focusing on North American cancer research data.

datasets.name: Neuro 360
datasets.description: Genomic and proteomic data for neurodegenerative disease research.

datasets.name: BrainMap
datasets.description: Dataset of neurological scans and genetic data for neurobiological research.

projects.name: Heart Health Foundation
projects.description: Broad dataset focused on genomic data for cardiovascular disease research, facilitating the development of targeted therapies.

datasets.name: CardioGen
datasets.description: Genomic and phenotypic data on cardiovascular diseases for targeted therapy research.

datasets.name: HeartBio
datasets.description: Extensive collection of transcriptomic data related to cardiac diseases and therapies.

projects.name: Global Immunology Consortium
projects.description: Collection aimed at immune system research with focus on genomic and transcriptomic data from various regions, designed for therapeutic target discovery.

datasets.name: ImmunoLink
datasets.description: Immune system genomic data for immunotherapy research, including cell typing and immune response patterns.

datasets.name: VaccineData
datasets.description: Dataset with immune response data to various vaccines, supporting research in vaccine development.
